1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: Safvan bin Assal r.a.’den: Şöyle söylemiştir: Ben seferde ve hazerde Resulullah Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem’in abdest suyunu döktüm

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَسْتَعِينُ عَلَى وُضُوئِهِ فَيُصَبُّ عَلَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: A man who asks for help with his ablution and water is poured on him
